name: Seemore Doolittle's 2
overview: Seemore Doolittle's Toyland Capers was created in a week using the Reality software construction package, this candyland\Christmas themed shooter was made by B Bell and released as an Amiga Format coverdisk 87b. In it, waves of teddy bears, toffees candies and sweets seek to pummel you from both sides of the screen while you shoot and avoid them as long as you can. Every destroyed baddie releases cake which you try to pick up before they fall off the screen to upgrade your weapons.
